vote.title: Authorize a three-year master agreement for industrial, medical, and welding gases - Airgas USA LLC, only bidder - Estimated amount of $902,819.62 - Financing: General Fund ($355,198.42), Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($532,510.11), Sanitation Operation Fund ($13,260.66), and Aviation Fund ($1,850.43)
